title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.4 - English requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.4 - English requirement

State Regulations

All applicants for qualifying certificates or for admission
to a professional examination who present study from a foreign country must
pass an examination in English given by the department, or present evidence of
the completion of a satisfactory course in the English
language. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
13.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
